meeting_info.location: Dallas City Hall, 6FN Conference Room and Videoconference

agenda_items.title: Service Price Agreement
agenda_items.description: Authorize a three-year service price agreement for the provision of a cloud-based Enterprise Asset Management Software System for the Park and Recreation Department from Vertosoft, LLC. in the amount of $632,512 through the Texas Association of School Boards (BuyBoard) cooperative agreement â€“ Total award not to exceed $632,512 - Financing: Current Funds (subject to annual appropriations).

agenda_items.title: Samuell Grand Park - Management Agreement Renewal
agenda_items.description: Authorize the first five-year renewal of the current management agreement with Shakespeare Dallas, to manage, operate, maintain and provide public theatrical performances and events at the Samuell-Grand Park Amphitheater, located at 1500 Tenison Parkway, through May 14, 2029. Financing: No cost consideration to the City.

agenda_items.title: Samuell Grand Park - No Admission Fee Days
agenda_items.description: Authorize Shakespeare Dallas, located at Samuell-Grand Park Amphitheater located at 1500 Tenison Parkway, to remove their No Admission Fee days beginning in 2024 effective upon approval by the Park and Recreation Board - Financing: No cost consideration to the City.

agenda_items.title: Urban Forest Master Plan Update
agenda_items.description: Update on the Urban Forest Master Plan.

agenda_items.title: Budget Development Update & Workshop
agenda_items.description: Update and workshop on budget development.

agenda_items.title: 2024 Bond Program: Final Proposed Bond Program list
agenda_items.description: Final proposed bond program list for 2024.

financial_items.description: Service Price Agreement for cloud-based Enterprise Asset Management Software System
